alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Iron; Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Iron, southeastern Ashland and northeastern Price Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Turtle Flambeau Flowage, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Iron, southeastern Ashland and northeastern Price Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
